name: Demon Defense
description:
Demon Defense is a new Tower Defense game where you get to muster your demons to try and capture as many souls as possible. Don't let the heathens escape purgatory or there will be HELL TO PAY.

This is a four level demo just to get some feedback on whether it's worth flushing this out into a complete game. Feedback is desperately needed before I commit more time to it, so please leave comments!

You can also follow the devlog for the game HERE.
